Adam Grant: "The 8-hour work day was not ordained from above for all time. It was dreamed up by humans in a particular time period. It doesn't make sense for every person, every job, or every organization. And it makes less sense in the knowledge economy. https://t.co/wIME24wRVe"
Beanie: "A lot of the problems in K-12 education boil down to over-complicating simple things."
Claire Honeycutt | ClarifiED 🕊️❤️: "It's not too late! If you start reading The Christmas Carol 30 mins out loud TODAY & every week day after, your family will finish it on Christmas Eve🎄"

rebelEducator: "Childhood is precious Don’t waste it on boring drill-and-kill test prep, fluorescent classrooms, mass-market nonsense, peer pressure and tray lunches It’s a time of unfettered creativity, curiosity, exploration, passion, play, and is to be defended"

Michael Strong: "When your child wrestles with an idea, resist the urge to correct. Ask what they notice. Ask what they tried. Ask where they want to go next. Stay with the process. The character they build and the thinking they develop will outlast any fact you could have handed them."

Claire Honeycutt | ClarifiED 🕊️❤️: "Alternatives to quizzes for reading comprehension👇 – Narration – Act out chapter – Draw the scene/plot – Compare chapter to something else they’ve read – Identify the “big idea” & support with evidence – Build timeline or event sequence Think beyond quizzes. Think Joy♥️"
